domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @realDonaldTrump I understand being upset over vandalism. But this is the issue you decide to take action on? Not the coronavirus, not civil rights, but protecting statues? You’re an embarrassment to the American ppl and the world. Can’t wait til you’re out of office
